title: Family of 2 children allegedly assaulted at NC pool files a federal lawsuit
description: The family of two Black children who were allegedly assaulted at a pool by an apartment complex manager in Greensboro, North Carolina, on Aug. 2 filed a federal lawsuit.

title: WATCH:  Passengers flee from burning bus in Argentina
description: Dramatic video shows passengers escaping from a bus in Argentina after it caught fire on the side of a busy road.

title: Appeals court wants limits on abortion pill access, sending case to Supreme Court
description: The abortion drug mifepristone should be more tightly regulated, the 5th U.S. Circuit Court of Appeals says in a ruling that now heads to the Supreme Court.

title: Illnois will provide burial for migrant toddler who died on bus
description: Officials say Illinois will provide funeral and burial services for the migrant toddler who died last week on a bus headed to Chicago from Texas

title: Blinken speaks to Paul Whelan, American wrongfully detained by Moscow: Sources
description: Paul Whelan, an American detained in Russia, spoke to Secretary of State Antony Blinken by phone from a remote prison camp in Russia, sources confirmed to ABC News.

title: Rival GOP campaigns throw their hands up at Trump indictment
description: Four-time indicted politicians would normally have their presidential ambitions dashed. But Trump is not traditional -- and rival campaigns are making peace with that.

title: Author opens up about AI technology's use in her own breast cancer diagnosis
description: In her new book, AI researcher and data journalism professor Meredith Broussard dives into the impact of some AI's deep-rooted problems.

title: Off-duty LA County deputy fatally shot by police at golf course
description: An off-duty Los Angeles County sheriff’s deputy has been fatally shot in an encounter with police officers at a Southern California golf course

title: DA proposes March 4 start date for Trump's Georgia election interference trial
description: Fani Willis has proposed a March 4 start date for the trial of former President Trump and 18 others on charges of attempting to overturn the election results in Georgia.

title: Small city soon to be without police force after officers resign en masse
description: The Goodhue City Council approved the resignations of the chief, a full-time officer and five part-time officers during a special meeting on Monday.

title: 4 more cases of locally acquired dengue reported in Florida
description: Four more cases of locally-acquired dengue have been reported in Florida bringing the total number of infections in the state this year up to 10.

title: Father arrested after handgun found in 3-year-old's backpack at school
description: Pete Robles, 35, has been arrested for child endangerment after a handgun was found in his child's backpack at pre-K in San Antonio.

title: Some abortion drug restrictions are upheld by an appeals court in a case bound for the Supreme Court
description: New restrictions on access to a drug used in the most common form of abortion would be imposed under a federal appeals court ruling

title: Former Santos staff member charged with impersonating McCarthy aide to raise funds
description: A former staff member of embattled Rep. George Santos has been indicted for impersonating an aide to House Speaker Kevin McCarthy in order to raise funds for Santos.

title: Marion County to return evidence seized in raid on newspaper
description: Marion County, Kansas, has said it will return evidence seized in a controversial police raid of a local newspaper after an attorney review.

title: British Museum: Staff member dismissed after items were missing, stolen or damaged
description: Items were found to be missing, stolen or damaged.

title: DNA from Oetzi the Iceman traces his roots to present day Turkey
description: New research takes another look at the DNA of the famous glacier mummy to paint a better picture of the ancient hunter

title: Severe weather leaves 1 dead, tens of thousands without power
description: Donna Warsaw, 78, was killed when a tree fell on top of her car amid a severe thunderstorm in North Carolina that left 67,500 customers without power into Wednesday.

title: WATCH:  Ed Sheeran gifts fan free Lego set, concert tickets
description: One lucky fan scored a free Lego set and concert tickets when she wound up getting served by pop superstar Ed Sheeran at a Lego store.

title: Tropical Storm Hilary forms off Mexico's southern Pacific coast
description: It's expected to strengthen, move north towards the Baja California peninsula.

title: Pence reacts to Trump's 4th indictment, says 'the Georgia election was not stolen'
description: Mike Pence on Wednesday in Indianapolis said, "The Georgia election was not stolen," marking his first reaction to Trump's fourth indictment

title: Renata Scotto, soprano of uncommon intensity, dies at 89
description: Soprano Renata Scott has died at age 89, Scotto’s New York-based manager, Robert Lombardo, said she died Wednesday in her hometown of Savona, Italy

title: Bolt was missing on police helicopter that crashed in South Carolina, report says
description: A report says a police helicopter that crashed at a South Carolina airport was missing a bolt that should have been removed and reinstalled during maintenance about six weeks earlier

title: 6-year-old accidentally shot and killed by 9-year-old, police say
description: A 6-year-old was killed in Jacksonville, Florida on Monday after the boy was accidentally shot in the head by a 9-year-old, according to authorities.

title: Dominican firefighters find more bodies as they fight blaze from explosion
description: Firefighters struggling to extinguish a blaze caused by a deadly explosion near the Dominican Republic’s capital this week have found two more bodies, bringing the death toll to 13

title: WATCH:  Baby gives dad the cutest look as they eat fries
description: We want someone to look at us the way this baby looks at her dad when he's feeding her fries.

title: WATCH:  Maui tourists shelter in pool as wildfires rage
description: Eyewitness video shows tourists taking refuge in a pool in Lahaina as deadly wildfires rage around them on the evening of Aug. 8.

title: England beats Australia 3-1 to move into Women's World Cup final against Spain
description: England moved on to its first Women's World Cup final with a 3-1 victory over co-host Australia

title: Mom drowns trying to save son at waterfall, dad rescues other son trapped by boulders
description: Authorities say a Massachusetts mother has drowned trying to rescue her young son who was being pulled by the current at a popular New Hampshire waterfall

title: American detained nearly 2 years in Russia gets additional trial delay
description: David Barnes is being accused by Russian prosecutors of abusing his children in Texas, but Texas prosecutors have found no basis to charge him.

title: Czechs ratify defense treaty with US that makes it easier to deploy US troops
description: The Czech Republic has completed the ratification of a defense treaty with the United States that deepens military cooperation and makes it easier to deploy U.S. troops in Czech territory

title: UK inflation falls to 17-month low of 6.8%, unlikely to derail interest rate rise
description: The rate of inflation in the U.K. fell sharply in July to a 17-month low largely on the back of lower energy prices

title: North Korea says US soldier seeks refuge, fled 'racism'
description: North Korea on Wednesday said the U.S. army private who crossed the border in July had "expressed his willingness to seek refuge" in the secretive country.

title: Evacuations ordered as Northern California fire roars through forest
description: A wildfire pushed by gusty winds from a thunderstorm is racing through national forest land near California’s border with Oregon, prompting evacuations in the rural area

title: Tuohy family, depicted in 'The Blind Side,' respond to Michael Oher's allegations
description: Michael Oher, whose inspiring life story was told in 2009's "The Blind Side," alleged that the Tuohy family has been profiting off the lie that they adopted him.

title: Judge calls new Texas election law unconstitutional but state says it will appeal ruling
description: A judge has called a new law unconstitutional that passed in the GOP-led Texas Legislature that will dictate how elections are run in the state’s most populous county
